channel.title: Project Recovery 317
channel.description:
[center]Here at Project Recovery, we're looking to go back to how things used to be. Not necessarily how RuneScape used to be, but how Private Servers used to be. Custom items, fun & laid-back staff, unique features, and hours and hours of fun and easy gameplay. We're a small community looking to grow into something larger. Of course, we're VPS hosted and have 100% uptime. There are also frequent content updates because we are always looking to grow into something more![/center]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/j7yeOx5.png[/img]
[ul][li]Points in Project Recovery aren't just PK points. They can be earned by doing a multitude of tasks, including Pest Control, Slayer, minigames, and more![/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/78V9Xzf.png[/img]
[ul][li]The prestige system in Project Recovery is designed to add a fun twist to the game while adding more hours of gameplay.[/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/PTc5fsX.png[/img]
[ul][li]This is one of our custom bosses, Party Pete. As you can imagine, he drops partyhats. He attacks with mage and melee.[/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/SNTd31D.png[/img]
[ul][li]This is the other custom boss of ours, named after one of our moderators. He uses all 3 attack types and drops penance gear, which is some of the best equipment in the game.[/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8y61q6Q.png[/img]
[ul][li]Pet cats! They're bug free, and you will never lose them.[/li][/ul]
[ul][li]We have loads of areas to train, including dragons, wyverns, and donator only training areas![/li] [li]There are plenty more bosses than are listed here, including the God Wars bosses, KBD, the Giant Mole, and more![/li] [li]Training is simple and fun, you can simply click the skill you want to train in your skills tab to train it[/li] [li]We have a fully working highscores! (Shoutout to deathschaos9)[/li][/ul]
I don't know if I have to get this approved or not, but regardless: http://project-recovery.net/index.php come play with us!

item.title: Project Recovery 317
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

jordan202:

when i try webclient it says failed connecting try again, same with downloadable client. help please

Head to your User folder or whatever (On Windows, generally C:/Users/Username) and look for a folder named (recoverycache), and delete it, and try again.

[quote=“Teem_Rocket, post:4, topic:527901”]If you’re hard-coding those context menu strings, you’re gonna have a bad time later on.

Otherwise you’ve done more than most of the Server Advertisement Threads. What is this based on?[/quote]

What do you mean? And Project Insanity

Read full topic
